page.title: Tool for viewing and executing an mCRL2 specification

step1.info1: Please load or insert an mcrl2 specification.
step1.title: Step 1

step2.title: Step 2
step2.info1: Please select the action to be performed.
step2.info2: To view the next actions of an action, please place your cursor over it.
step2.warn-parallel: Several actions can be selected in parallel! To select actions to be executed in parallel, please click on the blue buttons. Then click on the button: confirm parallel actions to execute them.
step2.multiple-choice: Plusieurs choix sont possibles pour cette action. Veuillez en selectionner un.

save-dialog.already-exist: A specification already has this name. By clicking save the existing specification will be overwritten
